name: Tileland
description: Tileland is a 2D sandbox game made in pure java. In its current state, the game is elementary but I am determined to make a big game out of it with many features and immersive gameplay. Gameplay: For now, all you can do is build and destroy tiles. You have an endless supply of tiles in your inventory so do not worry about running out of tiles. All tiles placed on the second tile layer are solid meaning that you collide with them. Features: - Destroy and build tiles -  Random level generation - Animations - Particles - Basic UI - Very basic collision system - Sound effects Controls: Move with WASD or arrow keys. Switch between tile building and destroy layers 1 and 2 with the 'k' key. Build/place a tile with the right mouse button. Destroy a tile with the left mouse button. Switch the current building tile with the number keys 1-9.
